examples: The liquids, light, and gases absorb
he absorbed the knowledge or beliefs of his tribe

definitions.text: take up, as of debts or payments

examples: She drew strength from the minister's words
The sales tax is absorbed into the state income tax

definitions.text: suck or take up or in
examples: A black star absorbs all matter
He immersed himself into his studies
The immigrants were quickly absorbed into society

definitions.text: consume all of one's attention or time
examples: Her interest in butterflies absorbs her completely
